page.title: 05THE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: A post-war aerodrome has been turned into a modern industrial estate that is served by a new ring road that will link up with the M1 motorway connecting the south and north of England. This estate is used by various storage and distribution companies such as :Metal Box,GEC Electronics,Jessops,Co-op shop chain etc. Alot of the local people are employed in the industries there as well as other people from all over Leicestershire. Both schools in the area use the firms on this estate for some of their work experience placements for students in their last year of school.
